remarks: Relate elementhood to a closed interval with elementhood to the same closed-below, open-above interval or to its upper bound.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Jul-2017.)
statement: eliccelico $p |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* /\ A <_ B ) -> ( C e. ( A [,] B ) <-> ( C e. ( A [,) B ) \/ C = B ) ) ) $.
